meta.query: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#

share_info.tips: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#的相关内容，来智搜看看
share_info.display_name: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#

response.msg:
嗯，用户让我分析关于"女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒"的搜索结果，并整理成回答。用户提供了29条搜索结果，要求引用时使用[^X]格式，并且回答要全面客观。

我仔细阅读了所有搜索结果。核心事件是四川旺苍县一位名叫"丽春"的女子因名字被嘲笑，四次申请改名被拒。公安局最初以"无歧义"为由拒绝，后来要求她提供精神证明。这反映了地方规定与民法典的冲突：四川省2018年户政规程限制成年人改名，而民法典保障公民姓名权。

搜索结果中有几个关键点值得注意：
一是法律争议。律师指出改名权不应附加条件，地方规定不能违反上位法。二是舆论反应。要求开精神证明被批是二次伤害。三是对比案例。有个人13个月改名11次被拒，但"丽春"合理诉求反被拒，显示标准不一。

用户可能想了解事件全貌和法律依据。我会从事件经过、法律冲突、舆论反应、进展四部分组织回答。开头要突出矛盾点：一个普通改名请求为何如此艰难？结尾点出省级部门已承诺修订规定。

需注意风险提示：个别网友猜测"不送礼办不成"没有证据，引用时要避免传播这种说法。重点放在制度性问题上，如地方规定滞后、执行标准模糊等。


以下是关于四川旺苍县女子因姓名“丽春”多次申请改名被拒事件的综合信息整理与分析：
### 一、**事件核心经过**
1. **当事人诉求与遭遇**
- 一名旺苍县女子因名字“丽春”长期被他人嘲笑辱骂（与古代“丽春院”关联），造成严重心理困扰，先后4次前往派出所、2次提交改名申请均被驳回。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "封面新闻", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/001DitQply8h8vhzzl20mj60j60j6jrn02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=lhw5UFdtg5", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "vType": 3}}```
- 公安局工作人员回应称“丽春”无歧义，改名理由不充分。当事人质疑：“她又不是我，怎么知道我的感受？”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1, 3], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "齐鲁晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229621318782023", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "齐鲁晚报", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.590.590.50/002c6guQly8hksm8b8b64j60ge0geaal02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=dIFwfMrrto", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229621318782023", "vType": 3}}```

2. **官方回应与处理进展**
- **旺苍县公安局**：初期依据《四川省公安机关户政管理工作规程（2018年试行）》第五十四条（规定成年人原则上不得改名），认定“丽春”无歧义且理由不充分。后要求当事人补充医院开具的“精神伤害证明”，以佐证姓名对其心理健康的影响，并承诺材料齐全后批准改名。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [1, 12, 15, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "成都条条通", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229572725145762", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "深圳新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229576771867392", "index": 17, "label": ""}], "name": "澎湃新闻", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.11.10.275.275.50/005vnhZYly8ftjmwo0bx4j308c08cq32.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=fno%2BDmQe96", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "vType": 3}}```
- **四川省公安厅**：承认现行户政规程与《民法典》存在冲突，正在修订工作规程，预计2026年出台新规。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [1, 2], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "三湘都市报", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.179.179.50/001R3oqEly8h8vg5q4wzdj604z04z3yf02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=Xl%2FNQ9sTgq", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "vType": 3}}```
齐鲁晚报

### 二、**法律与制度的冲突争议**
1. **《民法典》与地方规定的矛盾**
- 《民法典》明确自然人享有姓名变更权，只需不违背公序良俗。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [2, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 12, "label": ""}]}}```
- 四川省2018年地方规程规定，成年人仅限五种情形可改名（如谐音违背公序良俗、含冷僻字等），未涵盖主观心理伤害。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [2, 12, 15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "成都条条通", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229572725145762", "index": 15, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **律师与专家观点**
- **四川皓锦律师事务所李勇**：公民改名权不应附加额外条件，行政规章需与法律体系一致。若符合法定条件仍被拒，公民可提起行政复议或行政诉讼。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [2, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "偲赋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229620048958387", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
- **舆论批评**：要求开具“精神证明”是对公民尊严的二次伤害，且无法律依据。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [3, 24, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "齐鲁晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229621318782023", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "菜菜不爱香菜-C", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229617795302501", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "偲赋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229620048958387", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **执行标准不统一引质疑**
- 公众对比案例“朱雀玄武敕令”（13个月内改名3次）与“丽春”被拒，质疑审核尺度差异。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [8, 21, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "地瓜熊老六", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229616459416604", "index": 8, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "魔妖妖-卡住哪里卡住牙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229631072635146", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "轻风拂山岗-明月照大江", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229627595294101", "index": 23, "label": ""}], "name": "地瓜熊老六", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.40.649.649.50/eacedf04ly8geb0ltyihbj20j60j60tm.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=A9L3jVb65j", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229616459416604", "vType": 0}}```
- 官方回应“朱雀玄武”案：频繁改名属扰乱公共秩序，而“丽春”属合理诉求未获及时响应。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "地瓜熊老六", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229616459416604", "index": 8, "label": ""}]}}```
偲赋

### 三、**事件折射的核心问题**
| 矛盾维度 | 具体表现 |
|----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **法律冲突** | 国家法律（《民法典》）赋予的权利 vs 地方行政规定的限制性条款。 |
| **执行标准** | 不同地区/个案审核尺度不一，缺乏统一透明标准。 |
| **权益保障** | 公民心理伤害的举证责任是否合理？行政效率与人文关怀如何平衡？ |

```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [3, 14, 20, 21, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "甜粥小禹兮兮", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229621085733602", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "齐鲁晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229621318782023", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "小猫呆呆迪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229632270109441", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "魔妖妖-卡住哪里卡住牙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229631072635146", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "偲赋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229620048958387", "index": 25, "label": ""}], "name": "甜粥小禹兮兮", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/b3e34cf5ly8i6vcem20jlj20u00u00va.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=w4GQCskXHr", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229621085733602", "vType": 0}}```
### 四、**事件最新进展与社会影响**
1. **当事人申请终获批准**：
在舆论关注后，旺苍县公安局已联系当事人补充材料（精神证明），并表明“材料齐全即可通过申请”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [1, 15, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "深圳新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229576771867392", "index": 17, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "成都条条通", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229572725145762", "index": 15, "label": ""}], "name": "深圳新闻网", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.10.22.172.172.50/70f4e244ly8h8vgzbksu6j205f05fdfp.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762336089&ssig=hx6OsJ2LF%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229576771867392", "vType": 3}}```

2. **省级制度调整启动**：
四川省公安厅公开表示，正修订户政管理工作规程，拟解决与《民法典》的冲突，新规将于2026年落地。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [1, 2], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **社会观点分歧**：
- **支持改名自由方**：姓名权属基本人格权，行政机关不应过度设限。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [20, 24, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小猫呆呆迪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229632270109441", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "菜菜不爱香菜-C", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229617795302501", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "偲赋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229620048958387", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
- **审慎派意见**：担忧频繁改名可能导致法律文书追溯困难（如债务、犯罪记录），需平衡个人权益与社会管理。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大大大大萱仙儿", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229616501360841", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
### 五、**反思与建议**
1. **姓名权的边界**：
公民改名权受法律保障，但需通过细化“合理理由”范围（如长期心理伤害、歧视性谐音）防止滥用。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [10, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "芒果捞学长", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229626344606840", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "偲赋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229620048958387", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **基层执法规范化**：
加强执法人员法律培训，明确《民法典》优先于地方规章执行，并建立申诉通道。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "爱之幻乐小鸟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229606623250620", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **制度革新方向**：
2026年新规需落实“法无禁止即可为”原则，避免模糊条款，将公民主观感受纳入合理考量。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [2, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "偲赋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229620048958387", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```

> **总结**：该事件暴露了基层行政规范与上位法的衔接漏洞，推动四川户政制度向更尊重公民自主权的方向调整。目前当事人改名程序已启动，但深层改革需待明年新规落地，以从根源解决此类冲突。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "成都条条通", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229572725145762", "index": 15, "label": ""}]}}```

response.query: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#
